long_description: Fitted with 27 gears for the steepest hills, the Raleigh Talus 29er Sport hardtail mountain bike offers big 29 in. wheels and sturdy, Shimano parts to dominate your favorite singletrack. Sturdy Shimano drivetrain offers responsive shifting and efficient power transfer; trigger shifters deliver snappy, precise shifts through the 27 gears. Butted aluminum frame features a formed down tube and CNC-machined, tapered head tube for improved strength. Suntour XCR 32 suspension fork offers 100mm of travel to take the harsh edges off of trail features; suspension can be locked out when not needed. Promax Decipher hydraulic disc brakes use a 180mm front rotor and 160mm rear rotor to deliver powerful braking in all conditions. Weinmann U28 rims are outfitted with versatile Kenda Slant 6 tires for good grip, confident cornering and fast-rolling performance. Bike includes a basic set of alloy platform pedals (pedals not pictured). Specs on the Raleigh Talus 29er Sport hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
